title: Out Of The Park Baseball 16.8.38 (Update 8) Patch - SoN
description:
Game: Out of the Park Baseball 16
Version: 16.8.38
Coded: August 28, 2015 by gone of SoN
Type: Patch

Description: Out of the Park Baseball ("OOTP") is the most sophisticated and best-selling baseball simulation game on the planet. Since its inception, OOTP has won numerous awards, including multiple "Sports Game of the Year" awards, en route to becoming the most immersive, realistic, and customizable baseball experience a fan can ask for!

Instructions: This is just a basic patch. Install OOTP 16.8.38 as normal. Open the patch as admin. Click the "Browse For Exe" button and select ootp16.exe from the installation folder. Tick the "Make Backup" box if you want to make a backup of the original exe. Click the "Crack Game" button. Open the game and register with any serial. The number "1" without quotes works for sure. That is it. Enjoy!

Notes: Sorry about the delay on this. We didn't think there was going to be another patch
